description: aggregated statistical data about all the S3 buckets that Amazon Macie monitors and analyzes for an account.

nested_items.name: bucketCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets.

nested_items.name: bucketCountByEffectivePermission
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are publicly accessible due to a combination of permissions settings for each bucket.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessible
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that allow the general public to have read or write access to the bucket.

nested_items.name: publiclyReadable
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that allow the general public to have read access to the bucket.

nested_items.name: publiclyWritable
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that allow the general public to have write access to the bucket.

nested_items.name: unknown
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that Amazon Macie wasn't able to evaluate permissions settings for. For example, the buckets' policies or a quota prevented Macie from retrieving the requisite data. Macie can't determine whether the buckets are publicly accessible.

nested_items.name: bucketCountByEncryptionType
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets whose settings do or don't specify default server-side encryption behavior for objects that are added to the buckets.

nested_items.name: kmsManaged
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets whose default encryption settings are configured to encrypt new objects with an KMS key, either an Amazon Web Services managed key or a customer managed key. By default, these buckets encrypt new objects automatically using DSSE-KMS or SSE-KMS encryption.

nested_items.name: s3Managed
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets whose default encryption settings are configured to encrypt new objects with an Amazon S3 managed key. By default, these buckets encrypt new objects automatically using SSE-S3 encryption.

nested_items.name: unencrypted
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that don't specify default server-side encryption behavior for new objects. Default encryption settings aren't configured for these buckets.

nested_items.name: unknown
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that Amazon Macie doesn't have current encryption metadata for. For example, the buckets' permissions settings or a quota prevented Macie from retrieving the default encryption settings for the buckets.

nested_items.name: bucketCountByObjectEncryptionRequirement
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets whose bucket policies do or don't require server-side encryption of objects when objects are added to the buckets.

nested_items.name: allowsUnencryptedObjectUploads
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that don't have a bucket policy or have a bucket policy that doesn't require server-side encryption of new objects. If a bucket policy exists, the policy doesn't require PutObject requests to include a valid server-side encryption header: the x-amz-server-side-encryption header with a value of AES256 or aws:kms, or the x-amz-server-side-encryption-customer-algorithm header with a value of AES256.

nested_items.name: deniesUnencryptedObjectUploads
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets whose bucket policies require server-side encryption of new objects. PutObject requests for these buckets must include a valid server-side encryption header: the x-amz-server-side-encryption header with a value of AES256 or aws:kms, or the x-amz-server-side-encryption-customer-algorithm header with a value of AES256.

nested_items.name: unknown
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that Amazon Macie wasn't able to evaluate server-side encryption requirements for. For example, the buckets' permissions settings or a quota prevented Macie from retrieving the requisite data. Macie can't determine whether bucket policies for the buckets require server-side encryption of new objects.

nested_items.name: bucketCountBySharedAccessType
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are or aren't shared with other Amazon Web Services accounts, Amazon CloudFront origin access identities (OAIs), or CloudFront origin access controls (OACs).

nested_items.name: external
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are shared with one or more of the following or any combination of the following: an Amazon CloudFront OAI, a CloudFront OAC, or an Amazon Web Services account that isn't in the same Amazon Macie organization.

nested_items.name: internal
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are shared with one or more Amazon Web Services accounts in the same Amazon Macie organization. These buckets aren't shared with Amazon CloudFront OAIs or OACs.

nested_items.name: notShared
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that aren't shared with other Amazon Web Services accounts, Amazon CloudFront OAIs, or CloudFront OACs.

nested_items.name: unknown
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that Amazon Macie wasn't able to evaluate shared access settings for. For example, the buckets' permissions settings or a quota prevented Macie from retrieving the requisite data. Macie can't determine whether the buckets are shared with other Amazon Web Services accounts, Amazon CloudFront OAIs, or CloudFront OACs.

nested_items.name: bucketStatisticsBySensitivity
nested_items.description: The aggregated sensitive data discovery statistics for the buckets. If automated sensitive data discovery is currently disabled for your account, the value for most statistics is 0.

nested_items.name: classificationError
nested_items.description: The aggregated statistical data for all buckets that have a sensitivity score of -1.

nested_items.name: classifiableSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of all the objects that Amazon Macie can analyze in the buckets. These objects use a supported storage class and have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessibleCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are publicly accessible due to a combination of permissions settings for each bucket.

nested_items.name: totalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets.

nested_items.name: totalSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the buckets.

nested_items.name: notClassified
nested_items.description: The aggregated statistical data for all buckets that have a sensitivity score of 50.

nested_items.name: classifiableSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of all the objects that Amazon Macie can analyze in the buckets. These objects use a supported storage class and have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessibleCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are publicly accessible due to a combination of permissions settings for each bucket.

nested_items.name: totalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets.

nested_items.name: totalSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the buckets.

nested_items.name: notSensitive
nested_items.description: The aggregated statistical data for all buckets that have a sensitivity score of 1-49.

nested_items.name: classifiableSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of all the objects that Amazon Macie can analyze in the buckets. These objects use a supported storage class and have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessibleCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are publicly accessible due to a combination of permissions settings for each bucket.

nested_items.name: totalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets.

nested_items.name: totalSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the buckets.

nested_items.name: sensitive
nested_items.description: The aggregated statistical data for all buckets that have a sensitivity score of 51-100.

nested_items.name: classifiableSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of all the objects that Amazon Macie can analyze in the buckets. These objects use a supported storage class and have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessibleCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets that are publicly accessible due to a combination of permissions settings for each bucket.

nested_items.name: totalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of buckets.

nested_items.name: totalSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the buckets.

nested_items.name: classifiableObjectCount
nested_items.description: The total number of objects that Amazon Macie can analyze in the buckets. These objects use a supported storage class and have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: classifiableSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of all the objects that Amazon Macie can analyze in the buckets. These objects use a supported storage class and have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, when Amazon Macie most recently retrieved bucket or object metadata from Amazon S3 for the buckets.

nested_items.name: objectCount
nested_items.description: The total number of objects in the buckets.

nested_items.name: sizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the buckets.

nested_items.name: sizeInBytesCompressed
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the objects that are compressed (.gz, .gzip, .zip) files in the buckets.

nested_items.name: unclassifiableObjectCount
nested_items.description: The total number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze in the buckets. These objects don't use a supported storage class or don't have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: fileType
nested_items.description: The total storage size (in bytes) or number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze because the objects don't have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: storageClass
nested_items.description: The total storage size (in bytes) or number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze because the objects use an unsupported storage class.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: The total storage size (in bytes) or number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze because the objects use an unsupported storage class or don't have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: unclassifiableObjectSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The total storage size, in bytes, of the objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze in the buckets. These objects don't use a supported storage class or don't have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: fileType
nested_items.description: The total storage size (in bytes) or number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze because the objects don't have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.

nested_items.name: storageClass
nested_items.description: The total storage size (in bytes) or number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze because the objects use an unsupported storage class.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: The total storage size (in bytes) or number of objects that Amazon Macie can't analyze because the objects use an unsupported storage class or don't have a file name extension for a supported file or storage format.
